description:
Instantly Generate & Share QR Codes – Create QR codes in a flash and export them effortlessly as image files or copy them directly to your Windows clipboard.

QR Code Maker – Fast & Versatile QR Code Generation
Quickly create QR codes and export them as image files or copy them directly to your Windows clipboard.

Key Features
- Generate QR codes for text, links, emails, WhatsApp, SMS, calls, business cards, and Wi-Fi.
- Customize QR codes by adding a logo for a professional touch.
- Save QR codes as image files or copy them instantly to your clipboard for easy sharing.

Free 7 days trial
